pkgmetadata.longdescription: GWCloud Python API==================`GWCloud <https://gwcloud.org.au/>`_ is a service used to handle both the submission of `Bilby <https://pypi.org/project/bilby/>`_ jobs to a supercomputer queue and the obtaining of the results produced by these jobs.While there is a web interface for this service, which is recommended for beginners, this package can be used to allow Bilby job submission and manipulation from Python scripts.Check out the `documentation <https://gwcloud-python.readthedocs.io/en/latest/>`_ for more information.Installation------------The gwcloud-python package can be installed with:: pip install gwcloud-pythonExample-------:: >>> from gwcloud_python import GWCloud >>> gwc = GWCloud(token='<user_api_token_here>') >>> job = gwc.get_official_job_list()[0] >>> job.save_corner_plot_files() 100%|██████████████████████████████████████| 3.76M/3.76M [00:00<00:00, 5.20MB/s] All 2 files saved!
